monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: At the start of the turn, remove a Debuff from each Monster in the party.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Powered Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 150% of Attack value.

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Avalanche
skills.description: 1 x 160% physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Avalanche Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +40%

skills.name: Avalanche Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Barrier
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Beating
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Bounty
skills.description: This Monster gets 2 random Buffs when an enemy Monster is knocked out.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Buffing Restore
skills.description: When applying a Buff, 50% chance that a Debuff is removed.

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Focus
skills.description: Critical Damage values from equipment increased by 50%.

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Critical Liquid
skills.description: Water attacks have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Curse Breaker
skills.description: Aura: At the start of the turn, remove a Debuff from each Monster in the party.

skills.name: Dark Instinct
skills.description: Increases damage dealt by 20%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: First Impact
skills.description: Increases the base damage of the first hit of an attack by an additional 40% of Attack (physical) or Magic (magical). (25% for mass attacks)

skills.name: Gravity
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies - Base Damage is increased by 2 x 10% for every health and defense rating of the target

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Helping Hand
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (110 + 50% Magic) Applies Sidekick (Buff)

skills.name: Helping Hand Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (150 + 55% Magic) Applies Sidekick & Regeneration (Buffs)

skills.name: Ice Bolt
skills.description: 1 x 220% magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 275% magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 335% magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 410% magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 1 x 510% magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Breath
skills.description: 5 x 115% (575%) magical damage (water) Removes 2 Buffs from target - applies 2 random Buffs to itself

skills.name: Ice Storm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Magic Penetration
skills.description: Aura: Mage Monsters in the party ignore 15% of the target's Defense damage reduction value.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Powered Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 150% of Magic value.

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Magnitude
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Glory (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Magnitude Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Glory (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Magnitude Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier & Glory (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Multi Chill
skills.description: Aura: Chill (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Glory
skills.description: Aura: Glory (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Precision
skills.description: First hit of an ability has a 20% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Recover
skills.description: Heals 10% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Severe Hit
skills.description: If a single hit deals more than 20% of the enemy's Max HP (10% against Champions), the enemy is afflicted with Armor Break (Debuff) and a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Shatter
skills.description: Unique Aura: Chill causes attacks against enemies affected by it to have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Single Strike
skills.description: If this Monster is the last and only Monster during the turn to attack, it deals 25% increased damage.

skills.name: Snowball Toss
skills.description: 1 x 230% physical damage (water)

skills.name: Snowball Toss Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 285% physical damage (water)

skills.name: Snowball Toss Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 355% physical damage (water)

skills.name: Snowball Toss Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 435% physical damage (water)

skills.name: Snowball Toss Lvl 5
skills.description: 1 x 540% physical damage (water)

skills.name: Spectral Cannon
skills.description: 1 x 375% magical damage (neutral) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Spectral Cannon Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 450% magical damage (neutral) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Sure Strike
skills.description: First hit of an ability has a 10% increased Critical Chance and cannot be dodged.

skills.name: Ultra Speed
skills.description: Applies Agility, Spellshield & Sidekick (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%
